item.title: To the people of Japan
item.description: To the people of Japan, and the world, Lord Tennyson has these words Tho' much is taken, much abides; and tho' We are not now that strength which in old days Moved earth and heaven, that which we are, we are,– One equal temper of heroic hearts, Made weak by time and fate, but strong in will To strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.
